description.description_en: Herbs to 1 m tall, glabrous.Leaves opposite, lanceolate or oblong-lanceolate, apex acuminate or acute, base narrowed into a short petiole, blade glabrous, 7–13 cm long, 1.5–3.2 cm broad.Cymes 10–20-flowered, pubescent; peduncles 3–6 cm long; pedicels 1.2–2 cm long; calyx lobes 5, lanceolate, pubescent, reflexed at anthesis, ca. 4 mm long; corolla rotate, red, 7–9 mm long, lobes reflexed, oblong, acute, glabrous; corona orange, 3.5–4 mm long; gynostegium 2.5–3 mm long.Follicles one per pedicel, ovoid-oblong, glabrous, 5–8 cm long. Seeds flat, ovate, circular winged, 6–7 mm long, comose.
